snippet.title: Hedon II : Bloodrite | 10 Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hedon Bloodrite is OUT NOW! And it's a FREE UPDATE for everyone who owns the first game, simply update or reinstall Hedon!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1072150/Hedon_Bloodrite/
https://www.gog.com/game/hedon
https://zanthebonebreaker.itch.io/hedon
https://www.indiedb.com/games/hedon

Wanna chat with the Hedon community? Join us on Guilded.gg
https://www.guilded.gg/i/MkdjKdQE
